[[File:Figure 7 .png|centre|thumb|''edematous papules of urticaria'']]
See also Figure 5.

question.question: What is the primary characteristic of the skin condition shown in the photograph of urticaria?
question.option_a: The presence of dry, scaly patches
question.option_b: The appearance of blisters filled with fluid
question.option_d: The development of thick, leathery skin
